Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Ninhursag \Ninhursag\ prop. n. (Sumerian mythology) The great mother goddess in Sumerian mythology, worshipped also as {Aruru} and {Mama} and {Nintu}.
Syn: Ninkhursag, Ninkharsag. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Mamma \Mam*ma"\, n. [Reduplicated from the infantine word ma, influenced in spelling by L. mamma.] Mother; -- word of tenderness and familiarity. [Written also {mama}.] [1913 Webster]
Tell tales papa and mamma. --Swift. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: mama n 1: informal terms for a mother [syn: {ma}, {mamma}, {mom}, {momma}, {mommy}, {mammy}, {mum}, {mummy}, {mater}] 2: a name under which Ninkhursag was worshipped
